footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Nilou | Update Date: 10/15/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Due to her Passives and the nature of her kit it is highly recommended to play her **with only Hydro and Dendro** teammates. 
However, the Xiangling team can work while ignoring her Passives. 

The general team will be
*Nilou + Dendro applicator + Healer + Dendro/Hydro flex*. Ayato, Yelan, Xingqiu, Barbara and Kokomi are recommended, but do note Yelan's Damage increase does **not** apply for Bloom, same with Mona's Omen. 
The Dendro character has to be Dendro Traveler or Collei, with Dendro Traveler being slightly better in her teams, and both being free. 
A healer is almost always needed due to Bloom damaging the active character.
